dict.string: The number to the right of the "Orders" tab is the number of unprocessed orders currently waiting.
See the box above? You can type almost anything and b2bFront will find it for you - Try it!
You can import data into the Inventory from a variety of spreadsheet formats using the Import Data view.
You can use Template Tags inside descriptions of Standard Items to show classification attributes. For example {Colour} or {Widget Type}.
Labels can help you keep track of items in the Inventory by grouping associated products together. They aren't visible outside of the ACP at all.
You can get information on new releases, plugins, skins and more great resources from www.b2bfront.com
